Text: Puh-leaze can we seed??  Download speed is epic failing
What is the "cracked present"?  there is no cracked folder and the only thing i see is the vitality folder with a short cut

@handicapninja: the shortcut IS the crack. Install the game as normal and then use the shortcut from the Vitality folder to replace the one in JE's root folder (default: C:Program Files/Jade Empire). Run the game with the cracked shortcut and it'll accept your copy as legit.
